description:
Saegusa Mutsuki as nucleus of the http://anidb.net/ch39798 [Pandora Project].
Her dreams create the virtual world for all remaining humans. For the sake of her older sister http://anidb.net/ch19483 [Miyako] who considers this http://anidb.net/ch39798 [project] mankind`s hope, the young girl took over the burden of isolating all negative emotions of the community and taking them on herself by (by moving them to the shadow city under the full moon which serves as "trash can" of the virtual world); the fire hound http://anidb.net/ch39796 [Hedgehog] serves as symbol for executing commands.
name: Saegusa Mutsuki
